title: Serif face i.d
content:
Hey could anyone help me identify this face?

I think the number might be a different of custom job.

Any help would be appreciated :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [loveletters\_uppercase.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011533/http:/typophile.com/files/loveletters_uppercase.jpg) | 73.43 KB |
author: scrammit

comments.content: I'm not to sure about the type on the left, but the number on the right is [H&FJ Numbers Strasse.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011533/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_inside.php?wipID=13&productLineID=100018)
[This Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019011533/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/baskerville-2/) for the text on the left.
